name: Belgium VAT rates (standard reduced)

rates.notes: Used for specific supplies (e.g. certain exports/intra-community supplies) under Belgian/EU VAT rules.
Reduced rate for basic needs and some services (e.g. food, water, medicines, books, passenger transport, renovation >10 years). Exact eligibility depends on legislation.
Reduced/intermediate rate for limited categories (e.g. restaurant/catering excluding drinks, social housing, certain agricultural products, pay TV).

changelog.change: Bundled canonical rate list (0/6/12/21) with effectiveFrom placeholders for legacy introduction dates.

disclaimer: This dataset is intended for calculators and general guidance. Always verify special regimes, exemptions, and sector-specific rules.
